Key Match Events: Klay Thompson's homecoming wasn't a successful one, as Steph Curry scored 10 straight clutch points and 37 overall to hand the Warriors a 120-117 close win.
Klay Thompson caught fire in the third quarter, helping the Mavericks turn around a first-quarter deficit.
Thompson continued to perform well in the second half, shooting 6 of 12 from the 3-point range and nearly handing the Mavericks the win after putting them up 115-110 with four minutes left.
Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson's return to the Bay Area as a Dallas Maverick was marked by touching tributes from the Golden State Warriors, including a video tribute and a standing ovation from the Chase Center crowd.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors didn't wait long to give Thompson a video tribute, which followed with a standing ovation from the Chase Center crowd.
Thompson's looked for a shot on his first possession, with Curry guarding him, and got the foul on his old backcourt running partner, scoring his first points as an opponent against the Dubs.
